context:
That's nothing!  

The San Francisco Chronicle reported recently that a gold crown traced to Nancy Pelosi was found in an alley behind a Chinese restaurant on Grant Street.  Carbon dating has confirmed the crown to be between 13,000 and 14,000 years old.  A local archeologist speculated that the misplaced crown was likely a result of her most recent and 10th face lift performed by a local witch doctor and democratic strategist who used to live nearby on Stockton Street.  However, local Chinese dentists dismissed the find, stating that NO self-respecting gold crown would EVER agree to be part of her anatomy.....

No such thing as an "ice age." After Adam and Eve sinned 6000 years ago, God cursed the earth and along came extremes in weather--both hot and cold. The extremes are found in the north and south pole with the coldest temperatures and the most ice and then the hottest parts of earth such as death valley.

"Every species of animals which God had created was preserved in the ark. The confused species which God did not create, which were the result of amalgamation, were destroyed by the flood. Since the flood, there has been amalgamation of man and beast, as may be seen in the almost endless varieties of species of animals, and in certain races of men." {1SP 78.2}
